department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Contemporary Painting Practice: Beyond the Surface
course.description: Through image presentations and readings, students will be introduced to the art movements from the 1960s to the present - POP, OP, Capitalist Realism, Neo Expressionism, New Image Painting, Figuration Libre, Junge Wilde, Transavantegarde, Neo Geo, Neo Pop, etc. Students will create paintings for critique that reflect these artists' beliefs and concerns.
